description: Investigated 'unknown' type display in Claude Code MCP viewer for optional parameters (path, name, workspace_id). Confirmed tool works correctly - FastMCP 2.13.1, proper type hints (Optional[str] = None), all 75 tests passing. Issue is cosmetic schema introspection in Claude Code UI, not functional. Similar to FastMCP GitHub Issue #224 (MCP client display quirks). Tool runtime behavior is correct.
